BreadcrumbDescription: Donan has asked for my help attuning the soulstone to Mephisto's essence.
Callback43Header: Find a way into the Zakarum Keep
Name: Secrets of the Zakarum
Phase0Description: Donan has asked for my help attuning the soulstone to Mephisto's essence. We are to meet outside the ruin of a Zakarum fortress deep in the swamps of Hawezar.
Phase0OutsideSubzoneHeader: Speak with Donan outside the Zakarum Keep
Phase11Description:
Donan has asked for my help attuning the soulstone to Mephisto's essence. 

I should speak with Donan.
Phase11OutsideSubzoneHeader: Speak with Donan at the Ruins of Rakhat Keep.
Phase121Description:
Donan has asked for my help attuning the soulstone to Mephisto's essence. 

I should follow Donan deeper into the Ruins of Rakhat Keep.
Phase121OutsideSubzoneHeader: Follow Donan in the Ruins of Rakhat Keep.
Phase133Description:
Donan has asked for my help attuning the soulstone to Mephisto's essence. 

I should follow Donan deeper into the Ruins of Rakhat Keep.
Phase133OutsideSubzoneHeader: Let Donan open the sealed door in the Ruins of Rakhat Keep.
Phase134Description:
Donan has asked for my help attuning the soulstone to Mephisto's essence. 

I should follow Donan deeper into the Ruins of Rakhat Keep.
Phase134OutsideSubzoneHeader: Speak with Donan at the Ruins of Rakhat Keep.
Phase23Description:
Donan has asked for my help attuning the soulstone to Mephisto's essence. 

I need to raise the portcullis so we enter the Ruins of Rakhat Keep.
Phase23OutsideSubzoneHeader: Find a way into the Zakarum Keep
